p: The experiment was conducted in a laying quails farm in the Veneto region of Italy (“La Colombara” Società Agricola, Castelnovo di Isola Vicentina, VI, USA), after the approval by the veterinary authority, and in accordance with the article 2, DL 4 March 2014, No. 26 of the Official Journal of the Italian Republic ( http://www.gazzettaufficiale.it/eli/id/2014/03/14/14G00036/sg), implementing the EC Directive 86/60963/2010 EU regarding the protection of animals used for experimental and other scientific purposes.
